name: Pyramids
description:
Create 33 Pyramid Designs in a Single Click

One ❖ Pyramids component provides every combo from 1 row to four rows, with up to 4 divisions per row.

  • Perfect for pyramid charts
  • Choose up to 4 rows
  • Add up to 4 sections to a row
  • Choose custom colors for each row
  • Great for light or dark theme designs
  • Intuitive Variant Properties are easy to apply


Introducing FigBlog!

Go behind the scenes to see how ❖ Pyramids was made, including the trials, tricks and techniques used to build a flexible, easy-to-use component.
